items.title: Charges Endpoints
body: REQ_DEF:{"route":"/v1/chargesaefw","method":"DELETE","shortDesc":"Generate a chargeawfawef","headers":{"Content-Type":"application/json","Authorization":"API-Key"},"body":[{"attr":"id","type":"number","desc":"Id of a post."},{"attr":"description","type":"string","desc":"Charge description."},{"attr":"amount","type":"number","desc":"Charge's price in satoshis, unless currency parameter is used."},{"attr":"currency","type":"string","desc":"Charge's currency `USD/EUR/GBP/MXN/BRL/AUD`"},{"attr":"order_id","type":"string","desc":"External order ID (use your platform ID)."},{"attr":"email","type":"string","desc":"Customer's email."},{"attr":"name","type":"string","desc":"Customer's name."},{"attr":"callback_url","type":"string","desc":"URL to recieve webhooks `https://site.com/?handler=opennode`"},{"attr":"success_url","type":"string","desc":"URL to redirect the user after payment `https://site.com/order/abc123`"},{"attr":"auto_settle","type":"boolean","desc":"Indicates if this charge should be exchange to merchant's native currency."}]}
Use this endpoint to generate a chrage. This charge is payable through the Lightning Network or an on-chain bitcoin transaction.

REQ_DEF:{"route":"/v1/charges","method":"POST","shortDesc":"Generate a charge","headers":{"Content-Type":"application/json","Authorization":"API-Key"},"body":[{"attr":"id","type":"number","desc":"Id of a post."},{"attr":"description","type":"string","desc":"Charge description."},{"attr":"amount","type":"number","desc":"Charge's price in satoshis, unless currency parameter is used."},{"attr":"currency","type":"string","desc":"Charge's currency `USD/EUR/GBP/MXN/BRL/AUD`"},{"attr":"order_id","type":"string","desc":"External order ID (use your platform ID)."},{"attr":"email","type":"string","desc":"Customer's email."},{"attr":"name","type":"string","desc":"Customer's name."},{"attr":"callback_url","type":"string","desc":"URL to recieve webhooks `https://site.com/?handler=opennode`"},{"attr":"success_url","type":"string","desc":"URL to redirect the user after payment `https://site.com/order/abc123`"},{"attr":"auto_settle","type":"boolean","desc":"Indicates if this charge should be exchange to merchant's native currency."}]}
Use this endpoint to generate a chrage. This charge is payable through the Lightning Network or an on-chain bitcoin transaction.
